Description.GREETING2: Welcome to CED's new portal for clients.
Description.GREETING3: Through this portal, you can issue assignments and consult existing documents.
Description.GREETING4: If you have any questions regarding the use of this portal, please send an email to supportmcp@ced.nl.
Description.GREETING5: We will try to provide you with an answer within 24 hours.

Enter.TITLE: Choose the Appropriate Wizard
Enter.NOTIFICATION_1: By clicking on one of the buttons below, you will start the input process for submitting a new assignment to CED. In three steps, you will choose from a number of main topics. You will then be asked to enter additional information.
Enter.NOTIFICATION_2: If the order cannot be processed due to failure, it is saved and it is possible to process the order again later. The possibility exists to open previously saved forms to resume the completion process. A saved forms button is displayed at that time.

SearchResults.TITLE: Search Results
SearchResults.FILL_INPUTS: Fill the inputs in search criteria to start your search, the results will show up here
